content: this backpack is my 3rd design in a small series of artistic backpacks that are super simple to create the fading stripes bag features three colors using a striping pattern that creatively transitions from one color to the next all designs in the cinch bag series are made with the same pattern all single_crochet and use variations in color and surface detailing to produce unique designs with tons of personality these easy-level patterns will make any newbie crocheter feel like a seasoned pro
